actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 for purposes of providing that milk shall continue to be supported at not less than 80 percent of the parity price for milk until October 1, 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend from March 31, 1979, to October 1, 1981, the period of time during which milk shall be supported at not less than 80 percent of the parity price.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 for purposes of providing that milk shall continue to be supported at not less than 80 percent of the parity price for milk until October 1, 1981, and for other purposes.
